javax.swing
Class JPopupMenu.AccessibleJPopupMenu

java.lang.Object

                          +--javax.swing.JPopupMenu.AccessibleJPopupMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
AccessibleComponent, Serializable
Enclosing class:
JPopupMenu
protected class JPopupMenu.AccessibleJPopupMenu
extends JComponent.AccessibleJComponent

This class implements accessibility support for the JPopupMenu class. It provides an implementation of the Java Accessibility API appropriate to popup menu user-interface elements.

See Also:
